title: A �
alt: If you want in on the fun, map a key on your keyboard to the sequence U+0041 U+0020 U+FFFD (or U+0021 U+0020 U+FFFD for the exclamation point version), and then no update can never take this away from you.
transcript:
[A picture of a yellow post-it note with a handwritten message:]
A ⍰ took out the trash but the dishwasher still needs to be run.[Caption below the panel:]
Apple can try to fix the autocorrect bug, but I've already incorporated it into my handwriting.
